definition: thick and thin/coarse and fine/thickness (caliber)/coarseness/quality of work
thin or slender/finely particulate/thin and soft/fine/delicate/trifling/(of a sound) quiet/frugal

sentences.english: Authorization and access control can vary from coarse- to fine-grained.
sentences.chinese: 授權和訪問控制的粒度粗細不等。

sentences.english: Randomly paint the layer with a 200px soft brush with 60% opacity.
sentences.chinese: 用透明度60%，粗細200px的軟筆刷隨便塗鴉。

sentences.english: Just those tiny serifs make sure there are thick and thin parts, like the 'e' has.
sentences.chinese: 就是這些細小的襯線讓他有像“e”一樣的粗細對比。

sentences.english: Workers need to match pairs and size No. due to the different grains.
sentences.chinese: 由於資材紋路粗細不一致，需要配雙並對號裁斷。

sentences.english: In the jacket's back, just below her left shoulder blade, was a round hole that would have admitted the shaft of a pencil.
sentences.chinese: 夾克的背後，左肩下方的位置有一個鉛筆桿粗細的洞。

sentences.english: Lamp holder, lamp post moderate size, color and delicate, grace appearance modeling.
sentences.chinese: 燈頭，燈杆粗細適中，色彩調和雅緻，造型雍容大方。

sentences.english: A hair-thin fiber is capable of transmitting trillions of bits per second.
sentences.chinese: 一根頭髮粗細的光纖，能在每秒傳送數兆位元的資料。

sentences.english: We ranged steel pipes according to thickness and length.
sentences.chinese: 我們把鋼管按粗細和長短分類。

sentences.english: The stems are as thick as a man's finger and very thorny.
sentences.chinese: “玫瑰巨人”的枝幹多刺，粗細和男人的手指差不多。

sentences.english: Copy-paste should not change the contrast in your typeface.
sentences.chinese: 複製粘貼不會改變你字體的粗細比率。

sentences.english: Improvement wick thick thin after test record.
sentences.chinese: 改進燈芯粗細後的測試紀錄。

sentences.english: PAS staining revealed irregular septate hyphae and large round spores.
sentences.chinese: PAS染色見大型圓形孢子和粗細不一的分隔菌絲。

sentences.english: The floor tile joint wants thickly thin consistent, alines with the wall brickwork joint.
sentences.chinese: 地磚接縫要粗細一致，與牆磚縫對齊。

sentences.english: Vary the thickness and length of the lines.
sentences.chinese: 改變線條的粗細和長度。

sentences.english: Different stroke widths produce lines of different thicknesses.
sentences.chinese: 不同的筆畫寬度會產生不同粗細的線條。

sentences.english: Every line has a thickness, a length, and a quality.
sentences.chinese: 每條線均有粗細，長度和線質之分。

definition: shade (of a color, i.e. light or dark)
vein lines (in marble or fingerprint)/grain (in wood etc)
veined pattern/wrinkles/vein lines (in marble or fingerprint)/grain (in wood etc)
deep or shallow/depth (of the sea)/limits of decorum
the shaft of a pen or writing brush/pen-holder/pen
to glue to/to paste onto/to stick on/also written 粘貼|粘贴[zhan1 tie1]
mellow and full/suave/smooth and round/rich (in voice)
